ere are the extracted triplets:

<Lawrence L. "Larry" Morey
1:
--------------------
Text: Larry Morey:  He co-wrote some of the most successful songs in Disney movies of the 1930s and 1940s, including "Heigh-Ho", "Some Day My Prince Will Come", and "Whistle While You Work"; and was also responsible for adapting Felix Salten's book "Bambi, A Life in the Woods" into the 1942 Disney film, "Bambi".
Triplets:<Larry Morey
